about.title: About me
about.primary: Hello! I'm a passionate full-stack developer currently immersing myself in the dynamic realm of front-end development. Hailing from Orange County, CA, my journey into the world of coding began with a pivotal career change sparked by insightful conversations with developer friends. Encouraged by their enthusiasm, I delved into self-learning and formal education, completing an accelerated software development program at LearningFuze.
about.secondary: My initial curiosity evolved into a deep-seated enjoyment of coding, leading me to commit full-time to becoming a proficient developer. Prior to this transformative career shift, I had diverse experiences in Taiwan, where I navigated roles ranging from branding consulting and project management to writing/editing academic journals and ESL materials, procurement, quality assurance, and English teaching. In the midst of this, I pursued my passion for Mandarin Chinese, earned my MBA, and dedicated time to cycling competitionsâ€”all while relishing the unique charm of Taiwan and its wonderful people.

projects.title: Project 1
projects.description: Describe the project being very specific, you can use the Twitter standard: no more than 280 characters: complement the information: the skills learned or reinforced in its realization and how you faced it, prove to be proactive in the search for solutions.

projects.title: Project 2
projects.description: Demonstrate in this description the skills of a programmer: such as having commitment, having perseverance and accepting alternative solutions. Remember that being a portfolio you are not selling the project, you are selling yourself, it reflects the resources used: Frameworks, libraries, platforms, etc.

projects.title: Project 3
projects.description: If the project was collaborative, reflect it in this description, that will demonstrate communication and/or leadership skills. Additionally, if you made use of the mastery of a second language, it will reflect on you professionalism.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
